creator: Will McCurdy
title: Financial Stability Board to Hold Crypto Providers to ‘Same Standards as Banks’
dc:creator: Will McCurdy
content: The FSB's proposed rules come as many jurisdictions, such as the UK and European Union, finally clarify their regulations around crypto.
contentSnippet: The FSB's proposed rules come as many jurisdictions, such as the UK and European Union, finally clarify their regulations around crypto.
